name: IOUserAudioCustomProperty
desc: A custom property to associate with audio objects.

items.name: + Create
items.desc: Allocates and initializes an instance of the custom property class.

items.name: - init
items.desc: Initializes an instance of a custom property.

items.name: - GetClassID
items.desc: Gets the audio class identifier of the object.

items.name: - HandleChangeCustomPropertyDataValueWithQualifier
items.desc: Tells the property the data value is changing.

items.name: - SetQualifierAndDataValue
items.desc: Sets the custom propertyâ€™s data value.

items.name: - GetCustomPropertyValueWithQualifier
items.desc: Gets the custom property value for a given qualifier.

items.name: - GetCustomPropertyInfo
items.desc: Gets a property info object that describes the custom property.

items.name: - AddCustomProperty
items.desc: Attempts to add a custom property to the custom property.

items.name: - RemoveCustomProperty
items.desc: Attempts to remove a custom property from the custom property.
